trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> objects in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve an instance of this class through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以擷取此類別的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The collection maintains a reference to the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 集合會維護透過控制項的參考<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.DataGridView%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given column to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料行加入至集合。

trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the given column to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的資料行加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the column.
trans-unit.target: 資料行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於集合變更時。

trans-unit.source: Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns.
trans-unit.target: 集合變更的範例包括新增或移除資料行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection> named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection>名為`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the given column is in the collection.

trans-unit.source: The name of the column to look for.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains the column referred to by the given name.

trans-unit.source: The associated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control is performing one of the following actions that temporarily prevents new columns from being added:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控制項正在執行下列其中一個動作，暫時阻止加入新的資料行：

This method is being called from a handler for one of the following <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> events:

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> already belongs to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control.

trans-unit.source: Use the control <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> and <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> methods to temporarily set conflicting property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用控制項 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#BeginInit" /> 和 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.System#ComponentModel#ISupportInitialize#EndInit" /> 方法，暫時設定衝突的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /><see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.ColumnHeader" /> and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersVisible" /> property value is <see langword="false" />.

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.InheritedAutoSizeMode" /> property value of <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode.Fill" /> and a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value of <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-

<paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property values that would display it among a set of adjacent columns with the opposite <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> property value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> 具有的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DisplayIndex" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> 屬性值，會將其顯示在一組具有相反 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Frozen" /> 屬性值的相鄰資料行之間。

trans-unit.source: -or-

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control contains at least one row and <paramref name="dataGridViewColumn" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.CellType" /> property value of <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a column in the collection.

trans-unit.target: 在集合中的指定索引處取得或設定資料行。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="columnName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 取得包含於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection" /> 執行個體中的元素清單。

trans-unit.target: 包含集合之項目的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" />。

trans-unit.source: This property returns <see langword="null" /> unless overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 除非在衍生類別中覆寫，否則這個屬性會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.CollectionChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.OnCollectionChanged(System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Removes a column from the collection.
